alert.note: Alert for Kaibab Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 01 at 6:04PM MST until March 02 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST THURSDAY ABOVE 4000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow above 4000 feet. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 9 inches. * WHERE...Areas above 4000 feet near Fredonia and Jacob Lake. * WHEN...Until 8 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the evening and morning commute. Additional snow forecast from 5 PM Today to 8 AM Thursday: Fredonia 1 to 2 inches Jacob Lake 5 to 9 inches .
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
